S

saveDataToFile(String) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController
The method passes the file path to the database on the server to open and save to it data.
saveToFile(String) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.tcpNetwork.ClientTCP
A method that sends a request to a server to save the current database to a file on the server.
serverAddress - Variable in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController
Server Address for connecting to server;
serverConnectSuccess() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.view.UserInterface
The method that displays a message to the user about successful connection to the server.
showAllMatches(String...) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.view.UserInterface
The method displays all basic match statistics from the database.
showAuthorName() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.view.UserInterface
Show application's author name.
showMainMenu() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.view.UserInterface
The method displays the main menu to the user.
showMatches(UserInterface) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.tcpNetwork.ClientTCP
A method that sends a request to the server to provide basic information about all matches from the database to be printed out to the user.
showOneMatch(UserInterface, Scanner) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.tcpNetwork.ClientTCP
The method obtains detailed data from the server about one match.
showOneMatch(String[], String[], String[], String[], String[], String[]) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.view.UserInterface
The method displays the exact statistics of one selected match.
socket - Variable in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.tcpNetwork.ClientTCP
Client socket for server connection.
startProgram() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController
The method that calls the program.
stopConsole() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab3.pawel.salicki.controller.MainController
The method calls the method from the user interface with information about pressing Enter to continue the application.
